languages.text: "Провожу штатную инспекцию двигателя. Устав предписывает регулярно проверять, что изоляция не прохудилась, датчики никто не свинтил и реактор не рванет в ближайшее время. Обычное дело".

"I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."
languages.original_text: "Провожу штатную инспекцию двигателя. Устав предписывает регулярно проверять, что изоляция не прохудилась, датчики никто не свинтил и реактор не рванет в ближайшее время. Обычное дело".

traits.locale_text: "I'm carrying out a routine engine inspection. The regulations require regular checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

"I'm carrying out a routine engine inspection. The regulations require regular checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

"I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

languages.text: «Estoy llevando a cabo una inspección rutinaria del motor. La normativa exige que se realicen comprobaciones periódicas para garantizar que el material aislante no se ha debilitado, que no se han manipulado los sensores y que el reactor no está a punto de explotar. El pan nuestro de cada día».
languages.original_text: "I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy llevando a cabo una inspección rutinaria del motor. La normativa exige que se realicen comprobaciones periódicas para garantizar que el material aislante no se ha debilitado, que no se han manipulado los sensores y que el reactor no está a punto de explotar. El pan nuestro de cada día».

languages.text: 「ドライブの定期点検をしています。断熱材が弱くなっていないか、センサーが改ざんされていないか、原子炉がすぐに爆発しないか、定期的に点検することが規則で定められています。まぁ、いつも通りのことです」
languages.original_text: "I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブの定期点検をしています。断熱材が弱くなっていないか、センサーが改ざんされていないか、原子炉がすぐに爆発しないか、定期的に点検することが規則で定められています。まぁ、いつも通りのことです」

languages.text: “我在进行例行检查，看看这边的引擎怎么样。根据船上的规定，等离子驱动室需要定期检查，保证绝缘层没有破损，传感器没有出故障，反应堆也不会马上就爆炸。不过是些常规工作罢了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

traits.locale_text: “我在进行例行检查，看看这边的引擎怎么样。根据船上的规定，等离子驱动室需要定期检查，保证绝缘层没有破损，传感器没有出故障，反应堆也不会马上就爆炸。不过是些常规工作罢了。”

languages.text: "Ich führe eine Routineinspektion des Triebwerks durch. Die Regularien sehen regelmäßige Überprüfungen vor, um sicherzustellen, dass die Isolierung nicht geschwächt wird, niemand an den Sensoren herumspielt und der Reaktor nicht in die Luft fliegt. Alles wie gehabt."
languages.original_text: "I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

traits.locale_text: "Ich führe eine Routineinspektion des Triebwerks durch. Die Regularien sehen regelmäßige Überprüfungen vor, um sicherzustellen, dass die Isolierung nicht geschwächt wird, niemand an den Sensoren herumspielt und der Reaktor nicht in die Luft fliegt. Alles wie gehabt."

languages.text: « J'effectue une inspection du réacteur, comme exigé par la réglementation qui impose des contrôles réguliers afin de s'assurer que l'isolation n'a pas perdu en intégrité, que les capteurs n'ont pas été trafiqués, et que le réacteur n'est pas sur le point d'exploser. La routine, quoi. »
languages.original_text: "I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."

traits.locale_text: « J'effectue une inspection du réacteur, comme exigé par la réglementation qui impose des contrôles réguliers afin de s'assurer que l'isolation n'a pas perdu en intégrité, que les capteurs n'ont pas été trafiqués, et que le réacteur n'est pas sur le point d'exploser. La routine, quoi. »

languages.text: "Rutin itici incelemesini yürütüyorum. Mevzuata göre yalıtımın güç kaybetmediğinden, sensörlerle oynanmadığından ve reaktörün yakın zamanda patlama ihtimali olmadığından emin olmak için planlı kontrol yapılması gerekiyor. Her zamanki işler yani."
languages.original_text: "I'm carrying out a routine drive inspection. The regulations require scheduled checks to make sure the insulation isn't weakened, the sensors haven't been tampered with, and the reactor isn't about to blow anytime soon. Just business as usual."
